[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@elux/react-web](./react-web.md) &gt; [UserConfig](./react-web.userconfig.md) &gt; [DepthTimeOnLoading](./react-web.userconfig.depthtimeonloading.md)

## UserConfig.DepthTimeOnLoading property

定义Loading超过多少秒视为深度加载

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DepthTimeOnLoading?: number;
```

## Remarks

默认: `2`

框架将Loading状态分为3种：[LoadingState](./react-web.loadingstate.md)<!-- -->，可根据不同的状态来个性化显示，如：浅度loading时显示透明蒙层，深度loading时显示icon+灰色蒙层
